channel.title: How do i make npc's autospawn like on evilscape?
channel.description: how do i make npc's autospawn like on evilscape? i know it has to do with autospawn.cfg but i don't know how to edit it

item.title: How do i make npc's autospawn like on evilscape?
item.dc:creator: @Vince Vince`
item.description:
@Vince wrote:

Open Autospawn.cfg

Scroll down and Type

Spawn = (NPC ID) (X Position) (Y Position) (X Move Pos) (Y Move Pos) (X 2nd Move Pos) (Y 2nd Move Pos) -Info-

If You Don’t Want the NPC To Move, give the Move Pos’ 0’s.

[glow=red,2,300]Vince`[/glow]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make npc's autospawn like on evilscape?
